title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 626.4 - Approval of projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 626.4 - Approval of projects

State Regulations

In addition to those considerations provided for in law, the commissioner in reviewing applications shall consider the status of compliance with respect to the national ambient air quality standards for the air quality region and county in which the facility is located as stated in the applicable implementation plan promulgated pursuant to the Clean Air Act of 1970. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
626.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
